ru.tehkode.permissions.backends

Class PermissionBackend

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.tehkode.permissions.backends.PermissionBackend
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileBackend, MemoryBackend, MultiBackend, SQLBackend, YamlBackend

    public abstract class PermissionBackend
extends Object
    Backend for permission

    Default group: Groups have a default flag. All users are in groups with default marked true. No default group is required to exist.

    • Method Detail

      • addSchemaUpdate

        protected void addSchemaUpdate(SchemaUpdate update)
        Add a schema update to the list of updates that will be considered for performSchemaUpdate()
        Parameters:
        update - The update to add

      • performSchemaUpdate

        protected void performSchemaUpdate()
        Actually perform the schema update using updates registered with addSchemaUpdate(SchemaUpdate) This will update the schema from its current version to the latest version with an associated updater. It makes no attempt to roll back partially failed updates, but will update the saved schema version to the latest update which completed successfully.

      • getSchemaVersion

        public abstract int getSchemaVersion()
        Return the current schema version. -1 indicates that the schema version is unknown or this backend does not use schema versioning (For example in a transient backend).
        Returns:
        The current schema version

      • setSchemaVersion

        protected abstract void setSchemaVersion(int version)
        Update the schema version. May be a no-op for unversioned schemas.
        Parameters:
        version - The new version

      • getLatestSchemaVersion

        public int getLatestSchemaVersion()
        Returns the latest schema version known for this backend, or -1 if no schema updates are present.
        Returns:
        The latest known schema version

      • reload

        public abstract void reload()
                     throws PermissionBackendException
        Clear any cached data for this backend.
        Throws:
        PermissionBackendException - If an error occurs with accessing the updated data. Implementations may try to fall back to using existing cached data.

      • getUserNames

        public abstract Collection<String> getUserNames()
        Return friendly names of known users. These may not
        Returns:
        Names associated with users

      • getAll

        public abstract Iterable<MatcherGroup> getAll()
        Returns an iterator that will produce all matcher groups known to this backend. This may be an extremely long list. This iterable may not be completely filled. The backend may choose to asynchronously load results. In this case, calls to Iterator.next() may block.
        Returns:
        An iterable that will provide all matcher groups.

      • getOne

        public com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<MatcherGroup> getOne(String type,
                                                                      Qualifier qual,
                                                                      String qualValue)
        Returns a matcher group only if there is only a single result. If multiple groups match, or no groups match, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        type - The name of the section.
        qual - The primary-key qualifier
        qualValue - The value of the qualifier used.
        Returns:
        the result if only one result is present, otherwise null

      • getFirst

        public com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<MatcherGroup> getFirst(String type,
                                                                        Qualifier qual,
                                                                        String qualValue)
        Returns the first known matcher group, or null if no groups match. Ordering of groups is backend-dependant currently. This may be changed to be based on a sorted list of matching groups.
        Parameters:
        type - The name of the section
        qual - The primary-key qualifier
        qualValue - The value of the qualifier used.
        Returns:
        the result, or null if no groups matched

      • getOne

        public com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<MatcherGroup> getOne(String type)
        Returns a matcher group only if there is only a single result. If multiple groups match, or no groups match, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        type - The name of the section
        Returns:
        the result if only one result is present, otherwise null

      • getFirst

        public com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<MatcherGroup> getFirst(String type)
        Returns the first known matcher group, or null if no groups match. Ordering of groups is backend-dependant currently. This may be changed to be based on a sorted list of matching groups.
        Parameters:
        type - The name of the section
        Returns:
        the result, or null if no groups matched

      • getFirstOrAdd

        public com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<MatcherGroup> getFirstOrAdd(String type)
        Returns the first known matcher group, or creates a new group if none match. What 'first' means is entirely backend-dependant.
        Parameters:
        type - The name of the section
        Returns:
        Either an existing or new group, never null.

      • getFirstOrAdd

        public com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<MatcherGroup> getFirstOrAdd(String type,
                                                                             Qualifier key,
                                                                             String value)
        Returns the first known matcher group, or creates a new group if none match. What 'first' means is entirely backend-dependant.
        Parameters:
        type - The name of the section
        key - The primary-key qualifier
        value - The qualifier's value
        Returns:
        Either an existing or new group, never null.

        public abstract com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<List<MatcherGroup>> getMatchingGroups(String type)
        Returns all known groups of the requested type.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of group to look up
        Returns:
        Any matching groups. Empty if no values.

      • getMatchingGroups

        public abstract com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<List<MatcherGroup>> getMatchingGroups(String type,
                                                                                       Qualifier qual,
                                                                                       String qualValue)
        Returns all known groups of the requested type with qual set to qualValue
        Parameters:
        type - The type of group to look up
        qual - A primary-key qualifier
        qualValue - A value for the primary-key qualifier
        Returns:
        Any matching groups. Empty if no values.

      • createMatcherGroup

        public abstract com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<MatcherGroup> createMatcherGroup(String type,
                                                                                  Map<String,String> entries,
                                                                                  com.google.common.collect.Multimap<Qualifier,String> qualifiers)
        Creates a new matcher group with the provided parameters. Null values are not permitted in the entries list.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of group to create.
        entries - The entries the created group will have
        qualifiers - The qualifiers the created group will have
        Returns:
        Future of the created group, result never null

        Parameters:

        entries - The entries the created group will have
        qualifiers - The qualifiers the created group will have
        Returns:

      • getAllValues

        public abstract com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<Collection<String>> getAllValues(Qualifier qualifier)
        Returns all values this qualifier has across every matcher group. The result of the future will never be null, instead returning an empty collection representing no values.
        Parameters:
        qualifier - The qualifier to get values for
        Returns:
        Future of all values, no duplicates.

      • hasAnyQualifier

        public abstract com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<Boolean> hasAnyQualifier(Qualifier qualifier,
                                                                          String value)
        Returns whether any group has the gives qualifier set to the given value.
        Parameters:
        qualifier - The qualifier to check
        value - The value to check.
        Returns:
        Future of the result

      • replaceQualifier

        public abstract com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<Void> replaceQualifier(Qualifier qualifier,
                                                                        String old,
                                                                        String newVal)
        Replace all occurrences of the given qualifier set to old with newVal.
        Parameters:
        qualifier - The qualifier to operate on
        old - The old value
        newVal - The new value
        Returns:
        A value-less future, really only useful for completion listeners

      • allWithQualifier

        public abstract com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<List<MatcherGroup>> allWithQualifier(Qualifier qualifier)
        Return any matcher group containing the given qualifier with any value. The result is never null.
        Parameters:
        qualifier - The qualifier to check
        Returns:
        Future of the list of matcher groups.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws PermissionBackendException
        Performs any cleanup necessary to shut down this backend.
        Throws:
        PermissionBackendException - if shutdown does not occur successfully

      • getLogger

        public final Logger getLogger()

      • loadFrom

        public void loadFrom(PermissionBackend backend)
        Load data from alternate backend. Assume that this overwrites all data in the receiving backend (except for users not included in transferring backend)
        Parameters:
        backend - The backend to load data from

      • revertUUID

        public void revertUUID()
        Revert any occurrences of UUID-using data from the PEX database. This allows recovering from any incorrect UUID assignments.

      • setPersistent

        public void setPersistent(boolean persistent)

                                       throws PermissionBackendException

        Throws:

      • handleException

        protected void handleException(Throwable t,
                   String action)
        Common error handling mechanism used for backends. When an exception is caught, this method takes care of it.
        Parameters:
        t - The error thrown
        action - The action that was being performed when the error occurred

        Parameters:

      • getBackendClass

        public static Class<? extends PermissionBackend> getBackendClass(String alias)
                                                          throws ClassNotFoundException
        Returns Class object for specified alias, if there is no alias registered then try to find it using Class.forName(alias)
        Parameters:
        alias - The short name to look the backend up by
        Returns:
        The backend class, if any.
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException

                        Class<? extends PermissionBackend> backendClass)
        Register new alias for specified backend class
        Parameters:
        alias - The short name that the provided class can be looked up by
        backendClass - The class to be aliased

      • getBackendAlias

        public static String getBackendAlias(Class<? extends PermissionBackend> backendClass)
        Return alias for specified backend class If there is no such class registered the fullname of this class would be returned using backendClass.getName();
        Parameters:
        backendClass - The backend class to get the alias for.
        Returns:
        alias or class fullname when not found using backendClass.getName()

      • getBackend

        public static PermissionBackend getBackend(String backendName,
                           PermissionManager manager,
                           org.bukkit.configuration.ConfigurationSection config,
                           String fallBackBackend)
                                    throws PermissionBackendException
        Returns new Backend class instance for specified backendName
        Parameters:
        backendName - Class name or alias of backend
        manager - PermissionManager object
        config - Configuration object to access backend settings
        fallBackBackend - name of backend that should be used if specified backend was not found or failed to initialize
        Returns:
        new instance of PermissionBackend object
        Throws:
        PermissionBackendException
